Read in Book Order Read in Chronological Order Read in Publication Order

Read Last Contact in Chronological Order

What is it?

Chronological order is designed to tell the story though the constant forward march of time. It can lose some of the themes presented in book order.

Be Aware: the chronological order can interrupt chapters and jump back and forth between them. If you reach a jumping point, a banner will be presented that looks like this:

⚠️TIME SKIP: If you're reading in chronological order skip to: Demo Time Skip⚠️

If you're new to this order start with Act 03: Civil War - Projection

Go to: Projection

Back to Top ↑

20th Century (1900 - 1999)

1980s

December 25, 1984: Projection

Synopsis: Allorien's coming of age ceremony on the planet of Eblypso makes him a Mahtan and he takes and oath to not interfere with the path of humanity while watching them grow.

Focus Characters: Allorien, Timothy Li

Go To: Projection

1990s

April 24, 1990: Discovery

Synopsis: Allorien watches the launch of the Hubble Space Telescope and wishes it really could be used to discover what humanity needed to see.

Focus Character: Allorien

Go to: Discovery

April 19, 1995: Beginning

Synopsis: Allorien watches an act of terrorism. Instructed not to interfere they are staggered by humanity's desire to fight each other.

Focus Character: Allorien, Sai

Go to: Beginning

Back to Top ↑

21st Century (2000 - 2099)

2010s

October 29, 2019: Spillover

Story Date: October 2019

Synopsis: Allorien changes the natural course of the universe and thinks a pandemic will help unite humanity against a common foe.

Focus Characters: Allorien

Go to: Spillover

2020s

January 20, 2025: Backdoor

Synopsis: A backdoor built into the government of the United States decades ago gets triggered and locks down some key data that is needed to enforce power and restart the cycle.
President Donald J. Trump announces a project that, while he were going to do it anyway, now has a larger purpose beyond weakening privacy rights.

Focus Characters: Allorien

Go To: Backdoor

2030s

September 6, 2035: World War Three

Story Date: September 2035

Synopsis: Humanity fights itself, again, in the third world war. The Eurasian Empire defends the city of Mariupol. Sai and Allorien witness the very thing they were trying to prevent. Sai retires.

Focus Characters: Allorien

Go to: World War Three

Back to Top ↑

22nd Century (2100 - 2199)

2110s

April 5, 2112: Fracture

Synopsis: One third of humanity leaves the only planet home we had ever known, Earth, to start a new life somewhere else. Allorien and their new junior Fae watch the process as it unfolds.

Focus Characters: Allorien, Fae

Go to: Fracture

2170s

April 7, 2175: Reignite

Synopsis: Sai is on trial for violating her oath to watch humanity without interference, and old wound in the Crysix species reopens.

Focus Characters: Sai, Nhamashal

Go To: Reignite

Back to Top ↑

23rd Century (2200 - 2299)

2270s

2271
April 3, 2271: Connection

Synopsis: Cassandra, at 13, makes a connection with a 14 year old thief. A connection that will last a very long time with a great deal of benefit to both parties.

Focus Characters: Alestra Amalee, Cassandra Fulton

Go to: Connection

2272
July 24, 2272: Revelations

Synopsis: Sam grieves his grandfather, but is isolated from everyone that should be supporting him.

Trigger Warning: Exploration of traumatic memories, implied sui attempt.

Focus Characters: Samuel Knudsen

Go to: Revelations

2273
August 20, 2273: Blow Up

Story Date: August 2273

Synopsis: A scientist who melds two oft separate practices becomes frustrated. Chancellor Fulton punishes his top generals. Cassandra Fulton, well, is Cassandra.

Focus Characters: Cassandra Fulton, Serafín Vera'Cruz

Go to: Blow Up

2274
July 24, 2272: Revelations

Synopsis: Tim begins to learn and play with energies he has yet to understand.

Trigger Warning: Exploration of traumatic memories.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li

Go to: Revelations

December 1, 2274: The Three

Synopsis: Chancellor Fulton gives an order to eliminate a threat to the Terra Firma Empire. The remnants of the Li family are tried for illegal use of magic.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li

Go to: The Three

2275
February 14, 2275: Building

Synopsis: Chancellor Fulton leads his generals in building a plan to intimidate Terra Further. Cassandra has her own feelings about the project.

Focus Characters: Serafín Vera'Cruz, Cassandra Fulton

Go to: Building

2276
February 10, 2276: The Three

Synopsis: The Venusian princess is abducted from aboard the royal state liner.

Focus Characters: Gwendolyn Romulus

Go to: The Three

2278
June 19, 2278: The Three

Synopsis: Samuel Knudsen is arrested for finally being himself.

Focus Characters: Samuel Knudsen

Go to: The Three

July 4, 2278: Representation

Synopsis: King Romulus witnesses Le'Rue abandoning the lives of Sam and Tim to save the king's daughter when he could have saved all three.

Focus Characters: Andrew Pace, Jaedon Beyar

Go To: Representation

July 21, 2278: The Mission

Synopsis: Jaedon Beyar (codename: Xavix) receives his secret mission from The King of Venus. And the king continues a long going feud with the official elected leadership of the Republic.

Focus Characters: Jaedon Beyar

Go to: Mission

2280s

2280
December 3, 2280: Bridge

Synopsis: Prince Hedlund receives a back channel communication from Senator Pace, in an attempt to create a calmer future.

Focus Characters: Jamie Hedlund, Andrew Pace

Go to: Bridge

2282
September 1, 2282: The Meeting

Synopsis: Alestra is recruited to work for Venusian Special forces. Using code name Ylena she pulls of a daring heist in an act unexpectedly defecting from the Terra Firma Special forces.

Focus Characters: Alestra Amalee (Ylena), Jaedon Beyar (Xavix)

Go to: The Meeting

September 16, 2282: Keeping Notes

Synopsis: Jamie learns a disturbing truth about his parents, and starts opening his mind to the history of humanity.

Focus Characters: Jame Hedlund

Go to: Keeping Notes

2284
January 20, 2284: History Class

Synopsis: Nearly six years after being assigned the mission, Jaedon Beyar is teaching history and begins the process of saving three young people from prison.

Focus Characters:Jaedon Beyar, Timothy Li, Samuel Knudsen, Gwendolyn Romulus

Go to: History Class

September 20, 2284: The Wall

Synopsis: Gwen, Sam, & Tim explore the far reaches of the grounds of their university and find that there is much more to the world than they expected.

Focus Characters: Timothy Li, Gwendolyn Romulus, Samuel Knudsen

Go to: The Wall

2285
May 12, 2285: Memories

Synopsis: Alestra Amalee (codename: Ylena) sneaks into the underground storage vault of Terra Firma's Empire to steal her way to a new life.

Focus Characters: Alestra Amalee (codename: Ylena)

Go to: Memories

May 13, 2285 CE: Hatred

Synopsis: Chancellor Fulton Reacts to the theft of the memory cores from the underground vault and plans for a new system of control.

Focus Characters: Chancellor Fulton, Serafín Vera'Cruz

Go to: Hatred

  • July 27, 2285 CE: Tim Li and Samuel Knudsen are rescued in a classic prison break... from Saturn's third moon. REVELATIONS
  • July 28, 2285 CE: Tim reaches out with his mind, and finds something not quite human. BREAKTHROUGH
  • July 30, 2285 CE: Humanity is on trial. Fae and Allorien the two litigators are both charged with overseeing humanity. They have very differing opinions. ADJUDICATION
  • September 2, 2285 CE: Tim Li learns we are not alone in the universe. It sparks just the littlest hope in the universe. DETECTION
  • October 15, 2285 CE: Tim and Allorien make contact. Although, it didn't go quite how Allorien had hoped. CONTACT
  • October 17, 2285 CE: After Retreating from Venus' space protections moving to Venus' Second Lagrange Point, Allorien is asked to come aboard Edith. WELCOMING
  • October 29, 2285 CE: Jaedon tears through poisonous clouds of venus with everyone in his ship to reach Avalon Castle undetected. They all Face a security system that had never seen a Crysix being before. AVALON
  • October 29, 2285 CE: Sam, Gwen & Tim are introduced to the two generals that will guide their skill development and more details surface about the axion particle that powers the Crysix society. THE GENERALS
2286
  • December 19, 2286 CE: Sam and Gwen train for the war, on the very hostile volcanic moon of Jupiter. IO

2290s

  • September 19, 2292 CE: Tim & Allorien travel to Pluto with Sen. Pace, traveling though the Polymer Twins that protect Pluto. POLYMER TWINS
  • July 30, 2295 CE: Tim Li and Allorien head to the Crysix home world of Eblypso to sign a pact between the two species. THE PACT

Back to Top ↑

24th Century (2300 - 2399)

2300s

  • November 17, 2306 CE: Tim Li, the President of Humanity, consults with his closest advisors before giving a speech to all of humanity that may save, or end, his career. DEDICATION & ACKNOWLEDGMENT
